name: Dispel the Fear
description:
Dispel the Fear

Prototype Studio Week 4 - Crowd

Light can stop the ghosts, but love can dispel the fear. 

Tips: There are three save points which show the memories of the girl and her grandma. Light up the save point, the ghost will disappear.

How to play

  • Move - WASD
  • Rotate - Mouse
  • Use your flashlight to stop the ghosts. 
  • Restart - R
